section.p: The following table shows the results of a group of students for an examination and a re-examination. Furthermore, you see the final result, obtained through consolidating the data. This final result is the highest rating.
Enter the data for the examination and re-examination in a worksheet. Determine the final result through consolidation.

section.title: Solution
section.p:
Select the upper-left cell of the output area and choose tab Data Consolidate (group Data Tools) . In the dialog box specify:
Function Max.
Add the tables with the data for the examination and the re-examination as references.
Check Use labels in left column.
